scripts.test:smoke: yarn playwright install && MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=smoke REPORT_DIR=test-results/smokeTest REPORT_FILE=test-results/smokeTest/results.xml npx codeceptjs run --grep @smoke-tests-unspec --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:debug: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=debug npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 1 --grep @debug --reporter mocha-multi --plugins allure --verbose

scripts.upload-wa: yarn generate-dev && USER_TOKEN=$(${WA_KUBE_ENV_PATH}/scripts/actions/idam-user-token.sh) && SERVICE_TOKEN=$(${WA_KUBE_ENV_PATH}/scripts/actions/idam-service-token.sh) && curl http://ccd-definition-store-api/import -H "Authorization: Bearer ${USER_TOKEN}" -H "ServiceAuthorization: Bearer ${SERVICE_TOKEN}" -F file="@build/ccd-release-config/civil-ccd-local.xlsx" && echo ''
